website_summaries.verdict: These cozy earmuffs look and feel like a cable knit sweater for your ears.
pros: Interior is removable for hand washing
Fuzzy interior is removable for hand washing
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Cozy overstuffed material can keep muffs from lying flat on ear

customer_reviews.title: I love these earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: I love these earmuffs. They're ridiculously cute and warm and so so soft. Really comfy even with my glasses on, which has been a problem before. They're pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Haymon

customer_reviews.title: Warm ears!
customer_reviews.text: These ear muffs are terrific. I have very short hair and my ears were always cold. I purchased these based on reviews. They exceed my expectations! Now my ears are toasty warm. If you're interested the outer cover is removable. I found this out when I dropped them into the dogs water bowl before I'd even worn them. Popped off the cover and set them in front if a heat register to let them dry. Good as new! I love these.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fits tightly - good for kids and women with small head. Adjustable but not enough for wearing earbuds underneath them
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute. They are also pretty tight even though adjustable. I am a small woman, so don't think this would be good for a man. However I like to wear my Bose earbuds underneath and they fit too tight to allow that. So I will give them away to a shelter. If I did not want to wear earbuds underneath I would give it a 3, so I am being generous. For me they are a 2
customer_reviews.author: Judy  Ruby-Brown

customer_reviews.title: warm!
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are just what I wanted- they are very warm, very soft and are a tight (but not too tight) fit . They will not be blowing off your head in winter winds. The sweater-like material that covers the ear muffs can be removed and washed. I never thought to do that until I saw these allowed you to do so. These are great - if you want the traditional ear muffs that fold over your head, these are PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: The ear muffs are very nice. I just received mine today and they really ...
customer_reviews.text: The ear muffs are very nice. I just received mine today and they really feel warm. I am an earmuff wearer. I got what they said is "red". WARNING to buyer. The RED PAIR ARE ACTUALLY A MAGENTA PINK (like the picture). I was hoping it was just my computer not showing the color correctly. I'm not a pink person but I will give them to my niece who loves pink and just order another color. AMAZON PLEASE CHANGE THE COLOR TO READ PINK (or MAGNETA) and NOT RED! Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: A Meticulous Reader

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these earmuffs for vacations in Boston and Lake Tahoe. When they first arrived I thought they might be a little tight on my average-size head, but as it turned out the fit was perfect. The earmuffs fit snugly, kept my ears warm, kept the wind out (especially in Boston, brrrrr!) and looked cute in the process. I wore them for a few hours at a time, as we spent a lot of time outside, and they did not become uncomfortable over time. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: Valenka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need!
customer_reviews.text: We're taking a trip to Iceland and I was looking for a way to stay warm without destroying my hair every day. These are perfect! The part that covers your ears is much larger than I was expecting. They are comfortable and you can even wear them with the band behind your head, which is what I was hoping. I'm looking forward to using these on cold windy days in Iceland!
customer_reviews.author: blue12rain

customer_reviews.title: So warm!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought some as a Christmas present last year and since I couldn't find my old pair, I figured I'd buy one for myself. First off, it's really warm!! Second, I work at a store and it's becoming increasingly difficult for me when I have to go outside. It's so cold and my ears start to hurt if I'm out for too long, but this should take care of the problem! My my beanies/hats always fall off, but now that I have this-my ears won't be cold again!
customer_reviews.author: Magüis

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, warm earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The fuzzy part that presses against your ears is very soft and comfortable. There's plenty of insulation to keep your ears warm. The knitted covers are attractive and can be removed for washing. They fit just fine with the band on the top of your head. Even the headband is covered with knitted material. It took a while for them to arrive from China, but they're worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I bought those for my wife as a surprise gift. Our Florida winter is not as bad as it is up north, but those earmuffs definitely had seen some use this past season. My wife loves them and wears them any time it's cold or even windy outside. She even wore them in the house, when it was cold in the morning. They are very stylish and functional in the same time. Great for bike rides to protect your ears from the wind. I got her a black one as well, as they go with any outfit. Will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: sidd10

customer_reviews.title: Cute, But Not For Small Heads
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute and appear to be well made, but I have a small head and they just stick out way too far. The headband part, while adjustable, doesn't lay flat or touch my head at all. They cover my ears just fine, but then the band part is sticking up over my hair a good half inch no matter how I try to adjust it. Looks silly. I have to buy my hats in youth sizes, though, so can't really fault the earmuffs. Would probably be fine for someone with a regular/larger sized head, or a lot of thick hair, which is why I still gave 4 stars. I will be returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: knh

customer_reviews.title: Best ear muffs around!!
customer_reviews.text: I walk my dog 4 miles every morning in the cold and haven’t found something to keep my ears really warm until now. They are super warm, stay in place and allow me to be comfortable even in frigid temperatures which is a hard thing to do. I would truly recommend these to anyone! I’m so glad I ordered them. Most ear muffs don’t stay in place but these do and are the warmest I have ever found! This was a great find!
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. If you’re 5. They’re terribly small. Even for my 8 yo. They don’t cover the whole ear and they’re painful to wear as they “pinch” the head and ears because the band portion is too small for an adult or tween. Have returned these.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kurz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend this product. I got the brown one and it's darker then photo but still very pretty. It has a very nice Crochet cover to the earmuffs and the inside is very soft and comfortable. Covers my whole ear. It doesn't make my ear look fat compared to other earmuffs I've had. Adjustable so the top part can extend. The top part also has loose Crochet but doesn't effect the comfort or look.
customer_reviews.author: Manish Mohite

customer_reviews.title: They'll do for now.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the item would adjust a little more than it did. You have to be very careful when adjusting them or they will pop off of the head band. I had that happen but was able to get it back on. The covers that are advertised to come of for cleaning, are very hard to get back on. The neck isn't very stretchy and it's a struggle. They do keep the ears warm, but I don't think they'll last many seasons.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: This is really comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: I like that the band is retractable, or somehow varies in length. My ears don't get cold at all in winter, it's comfortable to wear for long periods of time, and I like that the ear covers can be taken off to be washed. My only problem is that one of the ear covers doesn't seem to cover the inner lining, so the white lining underneath makes it look kind of tacky. But eh, comfort over fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I've had ear muffs in the past so I knew what I was looking for. These have great insulation and very soft fabric. I love the stitching design and they adjust to fit my head very well. They are also snug so I'm not worried about them falling off. The only thing to add to them would be folding so they could be smaller but that isn't a big deal. I'll buy again if I ever need!
customer_reviews.author: Tmcc101

customer_reviews.title: love these! they’re adjustable so they fit me perfectly
customer_reviews.text: love these! they’re adjustable so they fit me perfectly! they’re comfy too!! & i love that i can remove the “mittens” to wash them!
customer_reviews.author: Car

customer_reviews.title: They keep my ears warm!
customer_reviews.text: I love the "knitted mitten" covers to the ear muffs. One drawback, and I can probably fix this: One of the muffs doesn't fit as snugly as the other; it bends outward a little bit. My ears are still warm, it just feels a little odd. Could have been bent during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: kate20061

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cute
customer_reviews.text: I am an adult woman with a small head. I can never find hats that fit. I seem to fall in that range between child and adult size. It's frustrating. The ear muffs have been the perfect thing to keep my ears warm in the winter in absence of a hat. The head band is adjustable to fit many sizes. Very pleased with the fit. Giving only 4 stars because my ears seem to hurt if I wear for over an hour. Although, that could just be because I'm not used to having anything pressed on my ears....
customer_reviews.author: Janelle C.

customer_reviews.title: These are alright- I can see where they might be ...
customer_reviews.text: These are alright- I can see where they might be a little tight in the ears after a while (especially with either earbuds and/or glasses. It is accommodating to a women’s head (being smaller than a man’s). I think they will work for me - the shipping was a bit high for my tastes but it is what it is. It would have been better had the earshell part been a bit more hollowed out.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina G.

customer_reviews.title: Good once washed- but got a used product
customer_reviews.text: I think mine was a return from a previous customer because it had two long blonde hairs on it when I opened it (I’m a brunette) I put it in the wash and tried it the next day and didn’t return because they were super comfy. Now they’re my go to. Bad first impression though from the seller with cleanliness so not 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: could be more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These did pinch my head, but I was able to bend them back to be looser, and they seem to have retained that shape I molded them to, so they're working. I wish there were a nicer, naturally adjustable version that cost a little more--I'd have been willing to pay for something like that.
customer_reviews.author: emmapeel

customer_reviews.title: Not For Bigger Heads
customer_reviews.text: Ear muffs are cute but if you have a head that isn’t small, don’t buy this. I have these stretched all the way out and still, it barely fits. The construction is also par, when I have it stretched all the way out, I feel like it’s moments away from snapping. Overall, cute, and I would be a good buy for anyone with a smaller head.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these earmuffs are perfect! Bought them at the last minute before a trip to a zero degrees location. The certainly kept my ears warm and cozy. The band stayed on well with adequate tightness, but not too tight. I do not think I would have been comfortable wearing ear buds like other folks mentioned, but otherwise they are perfect for the few times per year I will need them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit, Amazing Comfort and Warmth.
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly on my head, I have a small head so hats and other things don't often fit me well. They were perfectly snug and amazingly warm. I think the ear padding cover may be removable but I'm not sure. I haven't tried yet, but it would be convenient if they were washable.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: The Best Ear Warmers for Winter!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best thing that I bought for myself this winter. It gets really cold where I live and the winds can be very brutal but when I wear these my ears are super warm and it just helps the rest of my body stay warm. The actual muffs are very soft and the headband is a bit adjustable but not too much. Overall I think these are perfect for the winter and I kind of want to get a couple more to last me for many more winters!
customer_reviews.author: Gayathri

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, cheap construction.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. One of the muffs isn’t attached to anything but fabric on the inside. Also the construction is poor. The internal stuffing and stitching is obviously visible. Even if they were made better they barely extend long enough to cover the bottoms of my ears. I have a normal sized woman’s head. Too bad, because they are really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Gmom

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: The product does the work of keeping my ears warm and saved from the chilly winds, but the design is not great in the sense when I put it on on the largest setting, the inner lining of cloth peeps out which doesn’t look nice. And I avoid wearing it, so definitely waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Big, snug and warm
customer_reviews.text: These ear muffs are great. They are big and cover your head with a snug fit. The inside is so soft and warm my ears are happy. The first pair I got where damaged but they replaced the product right away. The fuzzy part does come off so you are able to wash them. If this bothers you you can always sew them on. I'm going to get more in other colors
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Ear muffs that fit small and medium size heads
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous ear muffs! These muffs are warm, adjustable, and not too tight! Because I'm a migraine sufferer, this is important!! They're cute too. They are not giant looking on ears, but ear pieces are plump. All the better to protect those cold sensitive ears.
customer_reviews.author: Zelda Griz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small head.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I bought these to wear at work as the AC blowes summer and winter right on my head. I check the sizes and reviews and this was the perfect set for me. I have a little head and they fit good. I do have to set them on something to stretch them as my ears are sensitive to pressure. But these are exactly what in was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hemond

customer_reviews.title: Good for work
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for work so I wouldn't ruin my nice pair. These definitely keep my ears warm however the band is stiff, and they squeeze my head (even though I generally have a small head for an adult). Threads are hanging off and you can see the tan cushioning inside through the knitted cover. But they were cheap, they keep my ears warm, and if they get ruined or I lose them at work, it won't hurt a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable and very large
customer_reviews.text: These did not last very long. I wore them one day ice skating and they broke within the hour. It would be nice if they were more durable. They are also very large in size so a little awkward on your head. I'm disappointed becauser I've been looking for a good pair of ear muffs and thought these would be them.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of  two

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely on my 5 year old but definitely large enough for adult
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 year old daughter and she loves them. They are a little large for her but I'd rather them be a little big than too small! Probably more for an adult. The fabric on the ear covers can come off if you pull them off intentionally...I'm assuming so that they can be washed. She pulled one side off to see what the inside looked like. Ear covers fit on snug so took a little to shimmy it back on. In the end, she's warn them indoors and outdoors in our freezing Maryland weather we're having right now.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Nice color but threads were loose and pulling all over the place, barely covered white interior of ear muff, and seems like it's going to fall apart. I nearly returned it, but luckily we are in Florida and they only need to last a couple days here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: These are bulky and not comfortable. It feels like they just stuffed paper towels into a yarn sewn pouch. They only fit over head, not able to wear with band behind neck. I’ll probably never wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Jacksonbrown

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that the mitts come off so you ...
customer_reviews.text: They're cute and they do the job. They arrived just in time for a week or more of below freezing weather. I'm wearing them now. I like the fact that the mitts come off so you can wash them if you need to. They could have done a better job on the adjustable head band so it fits your head better. But for the price they are a great value
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time with these. The headband is child-sized even when fully extended. If you do fully extend, it feels like the cheap plastic band will pull out from the ear warmer. The ear warmer itself is not concave like normal earmuffs to allow room for your ear inside. This makes them very uncomfortable. I haven't worn them once.
customer_reviews.author: Heather N.

customer_reviews.title: Look Fine, But Don't Fit
customer_reviews.text: These came as pictured and seem like they would be very warm. However they were way to tight on me and I don't feel like I would be able to wear them comfortably very long. So I ended up letting my 8 year old daughter have them and she loves them. Guess I'll have to keep looking for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Warm on my ears
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm just extra sensitive when it comes to my ears but I just find these a little bit hard on the ears otherwise they're big enough and they're pretty sturdy and they don't move as much compared to the type that you fold it up into little circle
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: ear muffs
customer_reviews.text: The ear muffs seem very well made. The padding on the ears was thicker than I'm used to and I was sort of surprised by the extra padding. I'm sure they will be fine and keep my ears warm. They look very nice and I'm thinking I will be pleased with the muffs.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: My pair was not well mad but warm
customer_reviews.text: They are very warm. However, on the left side the grey part of the ear muff doesn’t fully cover and you can see the white underneath which does not look good. I discovered after I already used them the first time so I guess I’m stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bara gott

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: These came very fast, they work great very warm and do not fall off. However it does kind of look like they slipped the muffs over the band so you can look into the ear pieces as if they were mittens. Not really a problem just not finished looking ha but regardless they work and are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: so disappointed😔
customer_reviews.text: Do not like how the fit. Can't be worn like in traditional headband like style. Too tight. Wish I had returned. I bought ahead of time for a gift for my daughter. By the time she opened them it was too late to return. The looked nice and were packed in a sealed plastic bag. I figured they're earmuffs they'd fit! But nope!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chinchillaamore

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were very poorly made, I wanted them to give to my 7 year old grandson with his Christmas gifts. I could not give them to him, they were horrible!
customer_reviews.author: TLHCoffey

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Hard plastic, hard to open and hold open to put on then it closes around your head like a vice grip! Way too tight, and you can feel the hard plastic through the muffs and when we tried to adjust it, the plastic ear piece came off! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Manders

customer_reviews.title: looks like great quality
customer_reviews.text: All fluffy earmuffs have the same problem: the plastic molds are cup-shaped with the edges pointed towards the ears instead of away. That means they sometimes sit uncomfortably and need some adjustment on your ears. These are soft, looks like great quality, and are really comfortable. Hopefully they are sturdy and last more than one season!
customer_reviews.author: PLS

customer_reviews.title: To small for adult
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement. Loved my earmuffs but lost them, so thought I was ordered another pair. The band on these is too short for an adult and the earmuffs were bent at an angle, so they don't stay in the head. Am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Savinski

customer_reviews.title: Cute warmth for your ears
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisfied with these earmuffs. The soft faux fur is luxurious and soft on my ears, the 'sweater look of the black knit on the outside of the muff, as well as the soft knit of the band, look good and securely stays on my head covering my ears, comfortably. When I wear them, I look cute, my ears are warm and isn't that why we buy them in the first place?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but too tight
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty. However the band is so tight. Also, the grey inside is covering up what feels like very, very hard plastic. The plastic is like the lid of a jar. You have to have your ear set in it just right or it really hurts. They aren’t very comfortable. I thought they’d feel like headphones because they look so soft. They are soft, but not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: C. McGrattan

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These ear muffs are so soft and comfy! They extend a little bit on each side, but I am 5’8” and I’m pretty sure I have an average head size and they fit great! I recently moved to Minnesota for school and these are great for the cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: L-Leon

customer_reviews.title: Super Warm
customer_reviews.text: I love these earmuffs. I ordered a pair for myself and 2 more for the other teachers that have morning duty with me. They really keep our ears warm. They don't pinch our ears or mess with our earrings. Our only complaint is that they muffle the sound too well. We can't hear each other talk! My best friend comes and borrows them for recess duty. She likes the muffled sound, so there is that.
customer_reviews.author: C. Reader

customer_reviews.title: The shipping is terrible. They were supposed to arrive by Dec 30
customer_reviews.text: The shipping is terrible. They were supposed to arrive by Dec 30. I got an email on Dec 30 that they would come Wed Jan 3. On Jan 3, I got an email that the company had no idea when they'd come. The earmuffs finally arrived Jan 5. Overall the ear muffs are all right. They are made well enough but the padding near the ears is thick and hurts a little. A more concave design there would be better
customer_reviews.author: JMills

customer_reviews.title: ... stay tucked into the fluffy ear parts so that's annoying but once I have them on I don't notice ...
customer_reviews.text: The cloth around the plastic doesn't stay tucked into the fluffy ear parts so that's annoying but once I have them on I don't notice anyway:P They do their job, they're not gigantic, and they're cute!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Best earmuffs ever!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 54 year old female and I have owned a lot of ear muffs in my time. You know being a girl on your way to work you don’t want to mess your hair up. These are the best ear muffs I’ve ever had in my life. They are so soft and comfortable & cushy.
customer_reviews.author: kim flynn

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need
customer_reviews.text: I like these ear muffs because they keep out the wind and cold without wrecking my hair. Ha! I don't go trekking in the wilderness but I live in Michigan where the wind can get crazy cold in the winter. Jyst what I needed..
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my mom. She won’t wear a hat but needed something for winter. She loved them. Never complained about pinching or ear hurting issues. My brothers kids kept stealing them and liked them so much I had to buy two more pairs for them.
customer_reviews.author: Ajamz

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, snug, great unisex product.
customer_reviews.text: Warm n snug, i used it with Balaclava and even the harshest wind was no match during snow cleaning. All set for -30F and beyond. Great product. Wish similar type ladies gloves were available too. Looks brighter than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: N. Banerjee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty earmuffs run small
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are really attractive with their knitted outer covering but if you have a large head (22-23 in in circumference) they are very snug and uncomfortable. I am very sorry that they did not fit because I like the design but I will be returning them with the hopes of finding some earmuffs that are a little bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: Ella C.

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable comfort and warmth!
customer_reviews.text: The ear muff arrived very quickly and was used that very day. My granddaughter really liked how they looked on her! They are warm and soft and completely covered her ears. They are also adjustable which was a definite plus! I highly recommend them! No disappointment here!
customer_reviews.author: Frances R

customer_reviews.title: Too tight!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst ear muffs ever. Already ripped and so tight on your head! And i have an average sized head... Basically head phone frame inside of fluff. Bad.
customer_reviews.author: tim forcella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These are the warmest and most comfortable earmuffs that I’ve ever worn. They’re also attractive and the fit is perfect. I highly recommend them if you are looking for something to keep your ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: pattie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product! Cute color, very cozy, definitely adjustable depending on the size of your head. Fairly large in the actual part that covers your ears, but I don't have a problem with that. They are good quality, but I could see them breaking down in a few years if not taken care of properly, which honestly isn't a problem for $10 earmuffs. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because when wearing my regular Apple earbuds with the earmuffs, it is a bit tight and uncomfortable. Manageable, but uncomfortable. They have definitely kept my ears warm, and overall I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: elissakate

customer_reviews.title: Too tight and not what I'd thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: The ear muffs seem warm, but the plastic is too tight to my head. I've been trying to find earmuffs with the band that goes across the back, not over the head, but they are too big. Goldylocks syndrome.
customer_reviews.author: Mostlee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that these wouldn't fit because I have a fairly large head, but they fit just fine when extended fully. They also collapse so if you have a smaller head you should also be fine. I haven't yet worn them for more than an hour at a time but I had no issues with them hurting my ears in that time span.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect... just what I was looking for. the band goes on top of the head instead of behind. Fit nice and snug. The ear covers come off and can be washed. I ordered 3 colors. -------- Months later order 2 pair again to give to friends. They love these too!
customer_reviews.author: snakes444

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Soft and Perfect for cold days
customer_reviews.text: These ear muffs are adjustable and fit comfortably. They are super soft. They keep my ears warm without hindering my hearing. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice but I wish they had a little more flex in them. After a while I find they cause too much pressure on my ears. I am sure for someone with a smaller head they would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Awful product
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are awful and I want to return them. First of all, 1 ear is all stretched out so doesn't even fit. Also, the covering on the ear part is crappy and the white fuzz filling sticks out. Very disappointed. They looked so cute in the picture, but the quality is very deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: These are the best earmuffs! My ears are very sensitive to the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best earmuffs! My ears are very sensitive to the cold so I'm always looking for the right fit and degree of warmth. But one of my pet peeves are earmuffs with a lot of puff(?) or whatever that sticks out. I used to wear that type eons ago, l'm 65. So these meet all three of my personal likes.
customer_reviews.author: Whimsy

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea but
customer_reviews.text: The inside part is showing so I need to fix it myself if I want to use it on my son to wear it Also is small if you have a big head or lots of hair it’s not for you
customer_reviews.author: Aneta Gapa O'Diah

customer_reviews.title: Covers remove for easy cleaning. I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Warm. Adjustable. Covers remove for easy cleaning. I'm very pleased. Worth the $10 I paid. The earmuff moves up n down to adjust the fit so the band is solid and doesn't catch your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a friend. These were very cute, but there were a few frayed ends and quite flimsy. Wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kopca

customer_reviews.title: Love the muffs
customer_reviews.text: If I don’t like it I send it back or give it away. I am keeping the ear muffs. Great fit and keeps the freezing wind out of my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie Durelle

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and warm - covers ears completly
customer_reviews.text: This product is super soft and adjusts well to fit a few members of the family (10 yo & parents). This was given as a gift and the recipient says it fits her well and keeps her ears snuggled up - no air leaking to the ears.
customer_reviews.author: M Illinois

customer_reviews.title: I’m not a hat person but get earaches easily from the cold
customer_reviews.text: They are very warm! I’m not a hat person but get earaches easily from the cold... problem solved with these muffs! I love them, although I wish they adjusted a little more.
customer_reviews.author: JES0621

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFY! MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I love these earmuffs! I work in the city where it gets really cold and windy and i can't tell you how much better i feel when i wear these! They are so soft and they really do keep me warm! MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Why did I resist for so long???
customer_reviews.text: I loved to Illinois from Florida about 3 years ago. After 2 winters of frozen ears, I finally bought myself these earmuffs. They are amazingly warm and fit my smaller-than-average head very well.
customer_reviews.author: LITH Shopper

customer_reviews.title: For Mom
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my mom she gets really cold ears in the winter and she absolutely LOVES them. She shows them off to everyone she can hehe. I am happy with the purchase because it keeps her warm and it brought a smile to her face.
customer_reviews.author: Pookie

customer_reviews.title: Love these earmuffs!
customer_reviews.text: I love earmuffs. I wear them all of the time. Even in the house if I'm chilly. I've tried different kinds of earmuffs, and this brand and style are my favorite. I have them in five different colors. They fit comfortably and are very soft on the ears. There is a little bit of pilling happening, but for the price I'm okay with it.
customer_reviews.author: Forest By The Sea Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them after suffering headaches from standing in the -3 degree temps we were suffering from right after Christmas. I leave my house at 5 am and don’t get back until 9 pm and I can say that these earmuffs kept my ears so warm that they actually started to sweat. Best thing I ever bought. Well worth the price and then some.
customer_reviews.author: the wizard

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I got them in gray and I was pretty disappointed. These earmuffs are not well made and look cheap. They're adjustable but they don't stay adjusted and they're uncomfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Warm, but Super Snug!
customer_reviews.text: Snug, nearly to the point of pain! I'm a 100-lb. woman, with a smallish head, but these are definitely a bit too snug. Fine for a half-hour run, but I wouldn't be able to endure them much longer. Definitely kept me toasty warm though.
customer_reviews.author: R WARNAS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color and soft, but there are strings hanging from knitted band so it looks cheap and unfinished. I had to adjust often because they kept slipping off my ears.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE AND WARM EARS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE EARMUFFS!! I wear them every day and they are perfect for walking to class in the cold weather. They are also super soft. I’m just really upset because I think one of the ears broke and now one side of the earmuffs is very easy to turn and I think it’s broken. When I put them on, a piece of plastic kind of sticks into my ear. I would really like a replacement as I’ve only had these for a week :/ UPDATE: The seller refunded my purchase, so I could buy a new pair. SO happy with the customer service. I love this product!! My ears have never been warmer.
customer_reviews.author: inm23

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Their tight on my head and no wind will get in my ears! Cold don't know my name
customer_reviews.author: DirtandDeath

customer_reviews.title: cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: I got what I paid for. they are warm but all I did was put them on my ears and the one side fell off. cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA L. KASKA

customer_reviews.title: don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, these were the worst quality I have ever seen. The covers were too small and showed the cream colored stuffing. Save your money, better quality for $4.99 at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie Clutter

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son to use for the 2 months it cold enough to wear ear muffs in the desert... But he loves them! They are very soft and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Alice H

customer_reviews.title: warmin' up my ears
customer_reviews.text: The ear muffs are just right - they fit comfortably and will keep my ears warm in the cold, windy winter
customer_reviews.author: sallyj

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are very comfortable, they stay in place, and adjustable to fit any member of the family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: run small
customer_reviews.text: These are too tight for me. Fits my toddler well. Not as well made as I was hoping. Coming apart a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Cold ears?  No loner
customer_reviews.text: Soft and snuugly. They fit right on my ears. I have to say, they are not adjustavle, so I guess I'm lucky. I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: rosanne

customer_reviews.title: CUTE, COMFY, AND WAR,
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice and fit well. They are warm and I like that the covers are washable.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia W. Swain

customer_reviews.title: so it's hard to wear them like you're supposed to without messing up your hair
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and cute but they're kind of tight and the bridge does not extend enough, so it's hard to wear them like you're supposed to without messing up your hair, but if you have a small head these would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kim.Crady

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We received the earmuffs Friday afternoon. Today is Monday and they have already broken. They have been worn for 2 days. We bought them for my son and he loved them for the 2 times he’s worn them, but can no longer wear them. One of the ear muffs somehow is not attached to the headband other than being sewn on. While the unbroken side stays close to the head and keeps the ear warm, the other side now bends away from the ear. I’ve tried seeing if it just somehow came off of the track that lets them expand, but it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like: warm, washable ear covers, band does not wiggle around and cause muffs to come off head. Dislike: not a big deal, but because the band is stiff, the muffs don't compress and fit in coat pocket
customer_reviews.author: papaws

customer_reviews.title: Could be warmer if not overstuffed and sit better on ears
customer_reviews.text: Too puffy, they don't sit flush on your ears and look odd since they're so puffed out. Could be warmer if not overstuffed and sit better on ears. I tried to pull some of the stuffing out but ruined them in the attempt.
customer_reviews.author: GPar

customer_reviews.title: Super toasty!
customer_reviews.text: I love these earmuffs. I wear them every day in the winter to keep my ears toasty. They make a big difference as far as how warm you feel!
customer_reviews.author: Manda Panda

product_meta.title: Knolee Unisex Knit EarMuffs Faux Furry Earwarmer Winter Outdoor EarMuffs
feature_bullets: Material - Outer is a soft knit material,inner lining is plush furry texture material, keep warm, protect your ear.

Size - One size fits most people.adjustable band, slightly stretch. The winter earmuffs can keep your ear warm without messing up your hair. Perfect winter accessories also a great gift for your friends, family, and lovers.
Design - Cute knit design, stylish pure color, lovely headband, Fashion simple type, for all occasions and wears, Well built, no worry about distorting.
Wide Application - Perfect for cold winter casual, shopping, skiing travelling and other winter outdoor activities.
After-Sell Service: If you are not satisfied with our product,please contact us and we’ll give you a satisfied answer without any additional conditions!
